external_references.description: Matt Wixey. (2022, August 9). Multiple attackers increase pressure on victims, complicate incident response. Retrieved January 31, 2025.

Michael Raggi, Adam Aprahamian, Dan Kelly, Mathew Potaczek, Marcin Siedlarz, Austin Larsen. (2024, March 21). Bringing Access Back — Initial Access Brokers Exploit F5 BIG-IP (CVE-2023-46747) and ScreenConnect. Retrieved January 31, 2025.

objects.description: Monitor executed commands and arguments that may be used to modify the compromised system by, for example, self-patching(Citation: Mandiant-iab-control) or disabling vulnerable services(Citation: sophos-multiple-attackers) in an attempt to limit subsequent exploitation of the system by additional unrelated threat actors.
